name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
A Link Between Worlds
formal_name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
A Link Between Worlds
description:
The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between
Worlds follows on from the story of
the 1991 Super NES instalment,
telling a new story in the kingdom of
Hyrule. The 3D visuals of
Nintendo 3DS bring a new layer of
depth to the game world, allowing
you to experience heights like never
before. It might once have been
difficult to tell the difference between
floor levels, but they are now quite
clear, lending more realism to the
battles and dungeon exploration!
